snippet: Summer droughts, like the one in West Lafayette, Ind., punctuated the warmest year on record in the United States in 2012. Weather Web sites ranked 55th out of 118 categories and subcategories tracked by comScore.
lead_paragraph: Summer droughts, like the one in West Lafayette, Ind., punctuated the warmest year on record in the United States in 2012. Weather Web sites ranked 55th out of 118 categories and subcategories tracked by comScore.
